about.title: About Me
about.text: I am Elderson Luciano Mezzomo, a dedicated and creative Frontend Developer with a passion for JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. I possess a unique combination of team leadership experience, analytical thinking, and profound knowledge in frontend development. Passionate about the exact sciences, I have acquired solid skills in frontend development and am now looking to further develop my technical skills in a dynamic and innovative environment.

skills.title: Skills
skills.skill2: Design Tools: Figma, Canva, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator
skills.skill3: Project Management and Agile Methods: Scrum, Kanban
skills.skill5: Software and Tools: Git, VS Code, Google Cloud

project1.desc: Central CAIXA is an app that consolidates all available applications of Caixa Econ√¥mica Federal in one place. Customers can quickly access all Caixa apps through Central CAIXA. Apps displayed in color are already installed on the device, while grayed-out apps indicate they are not yet installed. Additionally, Central CAIXA provides direct access to social networks, phone numbers, and other important links, simplifying the management and usage of Caixa services for customers.
